title: Home Sweet Home 2" Inch Mattress Topper Hypoallergenic Down Alternative 1000 Grams Filling (Queen)
features: Filled with 1000 Grams filling for ultimate support. Hypoallergenic microfiber cover adds another layer of softness to your topper.

Gusset baffle box construction maintains loft and ensures even filling distribution for optimum comfort. Baffle boxes also have the upper hand in regard to the life of a mattress topper. The extra strip of fabric cuts down on wear and tear, which can enhance the topper's durability and longevity.

To prevent your topper from moving from its place during your sleep, we've added anchor bands on each corner, allowing your topper to stick to its form throughout the night. Easy to install with on/off elastic bands. Simply apply the bands around your mattress.

Soften your mattress and change the way you sleep with this mattress topper. Whether you're looking to add comfort to an uncomfortable mattress, or simply just make your favorite even more comfortable, this mattress topper makes the perfect pick.
Twin: 39" x 75" Inch. Full 54" x 75". Queen: 60" x 80". King 78" x 80". Each size has the ultimate 2" inch thickness.
description: Restore your mattress with this Down Alternative Topper. With its crafty baffle box stitch design, fiber will not shift but stay in place so you can have the right amount of fiber consistently throughout the night. Instead of buying a brand new mattress, just apply this topper to maximize the life of your mattress. To prevent your topper from moving from its place during your sleep, we've added anchor bands on each corner, allowing your topper to stick to its form throughout the night. Soften your mattress and change the way you sleep with this mattress topper. Whether you're looking to add comfort to an uncomfortable mattress, or simply just make your favorite even more comfortable, this mattress topper makes the perfect pick.
